column5: Thanks elkman99 dose anyone know if there are any chips I could use in my lowrance for cliff lake or where you can get a good paper map. Elkman can I get from cliff to nelson it looks smaller and it may be easer to find the perch.

Cliff is literally right across the street from Cedar, but there is no way to boat from one to the other. Nelson is connected to the north side of Cedar. I think there is a public launch on the west side of Cedar, but I could be mistaken. There is an explorer series paper map that has both Cliff and Cedar on it...along with Nelson.
